description: The Trip Assignment UI (TASK-3101) cannot be built until the core Trip Model (TASK-3001) is defined.
mitigation_plan: Schedule in consecutive sprints. S3 for model, S4 for assignment.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire trip lifecycle implementation.

description: Kubernetes manifests (TASK-9040) cannot be deployed until the EKS cluster (TASK-9002) is provisioned.
mitigation_plan: Prioritize infrastructure sprints early in the project timeline.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks all application deployments and subsequent testing.

description: The GSP API client development (TASK-401) is blocked until the GSP vendor provides stable sandbox credentials and documentation.
mitigation_plan: RISK-001: Develop a mock GSP server in parallel to unblock frontend and workflow development.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire e-invoicing epic, a critical business requirement.
